template.name: Human_Follower

location.name: busy
location.label: t' == 1 && h' == v && freeWill'==0 && F <= passout_th && F' == lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && updateTimer<=pollTime

transition.label: !served[id-1] && freeWill>=freeWillTh
free_stop!
t = 0, freeWill = 0, timeP = 0, oldFatigue=humanFatigue[id-1], oldPosX=humanPositionX[id-1], oldPosY=humanPositionY[id-1], updateF(oldFatigue, -lambda, 1, 1), updateTimer=0, updateFreeWill()
stop_h_action?
t = 0, oldFatigue=humanFatigue[id-1], oldPosX=humanPositionX[id-1], oldPosY=humanPositionY[id-1], updateF(oldFatigue, -lambda, 1, 1), updateTimer=0, updateFreeWill()

template.name: Human_Leader

location.name: busy
location.label: t' == 1 && h' == v && F <= passout_th && freeWill' == 0 && F' == lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && updateTimer<=pollTime

transition.label: !served[id-1] && freeWill >= freeWillTh
stop_h_action!
t = 0, hExe = 0, oldFatigue=humanFatigue[id-1], oldPosX=humanPositionX[id-1], oldPosY=humanPositionY[id-1], updateF(oldFatigue, -lambda, 1, 1), updateTimer=0
served[id-1]
stop_h_action!
t = 0, hExe = 0, oldFatigue=humanFatigue[id-1], oldPosX=humanPositionX[id-1], oldPosY=humanPositionY[id-1], updateF(oldFatigue, -lambda, 1, 1), updateTimer=0
!served[id-1] && F<=0 && currH == id
start_h_action[id]!
F = 0, t = 0, oldFatigue=0, updateF(oldFatigue, -mi, 0, 1), updateTimer=0, hExe = 1

template.name: Human_Recipient

location.name: busy_mov
location.label: t' == 1 && h' == v && freeWill'==0 && F <= passout_th && F' == lambda*exp(-lambda*t) && updateTimer<=pollTime

transition.label: stop_h_action?
t = 0, freeWill = 0, timeP = 0, oldFatigue=humanFatigue[id-1], oldPosX=humanPositionX[id-1], oldPosY=humanPositionY[id-1], updateF(oldFatigue, -lambda, 1, 1), updateTimer=0, updateFreeWill()
start_h_action[id]?
t = 0, oldFatigue=humanFatigue[id-1], oldPosX=humanPositionX[id-1], oldPosY=humanPositionY[id-1], updateF(oldFatigue, -lambda, 1, 1), updateTimer=0, updateFreeWill()
freeWill>=freeWillTh
free_stop!
t = 0, freeWill = 0, timeP = 0, oldFatigue=humanFatigue[id-1], oldPosX=humanPositionX[id-1], oldPosY=humanPositionY[id-1], updateF(oldFatigue, -lambda, 1, 1), updateTimer=0, updateFreeWill()

template.name: Robot
template.parameter: int id, int v_max, int a_max

location.name: starting
location.label: V' == a_max && V <= v_max && r' == V && updateTimer <=pollTime

template.name: Battery

location.name: recharging_upto80
location.label: C' == r_1*cheatFactor && C <= C_80 && updateTimer <= pollTime

location.name: recharging_upto20
location.label: C' == r_3*cheatFactor && C <= C_20 && updateTimer <= pollTime

location.name: recharging_upto100
location.label: C' == r_2*cheatFactor && C <= C_100 && updateTimer <= pollTime

template.name: Orchestrator

query.formula: simulate[<=700]{robPositionX, robPositionY, humanPositionX[0], humanPositionY[0], o.mission_accomplished, served[0], robTheta, o.exe_1, o.exe_2}
simulate[<=800]{b.C/100, o.exe_1, o.exe_2, rob.recharging, alice.busy*0.5, bob.busy*0.5, carl.busy*0.5, humanFatigue[0], humanFatigue[1], humanFatigue[2]}

simulate[<=800]{robTheta*10, robPositionX, robPositionY, o.exe_1*-100, o.exe_2*-100, o.destIsOnTheRight*100, o.destIsOnTheLeft*100, o.destIsAhead*100, o.destIsBehind*100, served[0]*200, served[1]*200, served[2]*200}
simulate[<=510]{o.humanCanStart*150, rob.recharging*150, o.exe_1*-100, o.exe_2*-100, served[0]*200, served[1]*200, served[2]*200, alice.busy*100, bob.busy*100, carl.busy_mov*100, carl.busy_rec*100}

simulate[<=800]{batteryCharge*10, o.mov_to_station*100, o.busy_recharging*50, o.exe_1*50, o.recharge*120, o.stopRecharge*120, o.aStop*120, o.aStart*120, fail*120, o.dX, o.dY, rob.stopping*50, rob.moving*50, rob.recharging*75, robPositionX, robPositionY}
